name: Monster Truck Madness
description: Based on the PC game of the same name, Monster Truck Madness comes to the Game Boy Advance sporting a variety of vehicles and tracks. Now you can get behind the steering wheel of one of 10 monster trucks, each with unique attributes, to compete in different challenges. All 30 tracks feature destructible objects, such as fences and crates, and an array of power-ups. Play dirty or play fair in three game modes, including Instant Action, Race, and Time Trial.
